channel.title: Comments on: We’re on the road to Morocco

item.title: By: Theresa
item.dc:creator: Theresa
item.description: Daaaaaaaaaamn, it's a good thing LaToya had you there, Will. Sounds like you have quite the adventure of your own getting there too! Isn't missing your train stop fun? :p
item.content:encoded: Daaaaaaaaaamn, it’s a good thing LaToya had you there, Will. Sounds like you have quite the adventure of your own getting there too! Isn’t missing your train stop fun? :p

item.title: By: Alix
item.dc:creator: Alix
item.description: Will- you are my hero (as well as Latoya's!!) What a big heart you have to go all the way back and find her. I'm a bit pissed that the school made no effort though; that could have turned into a very dangerous situation for her. I hope things change once you two start teaching. Casablanca... wow.. sounds like a dream. Your adventure is only beginning-I can't wait to read more! Stay safe, take it all in. -Alix
item.content:encoded: Will- you are my hero (as well as Latoya’s!!) What a big heart you have to go all the way back and find her. I’m a bit pissed that the school made no effort though; that could have turned into a very dangerous situation for her. I hope things change once you two start teaching. Casablanca… wow.. sounds like a dream. Your adventure is only beginning-I can’t wait to read more! Stay safe, take it all in. -Alix

item.title: By: Lindsay
item.dc:creator: Lindsay
item.description: Wow what an adventure youre having already. Glad to hear you both got there okay. Enjoy yourself and keep us updated :) Lindsay
item.content:encoded:
Wow what an adventure youre having already. Glad to hear you both got there okay. Enjoy yourself and keep us updated :)
Lindsay

item.title: By: Ragan
item.dc:creator: Ragan
item.description: This was awesome. And touching. Latoya's a lucky gal to have you as a friend. :) Buena suerte from Costa Rica to Morocco!
item.content:encoded: This was awesome. And touching. Latoya’s a lucky gal to have you as a friend. :) Buena suerte from Costa Rica to Morocco!

item.title: By: Eddie
item.dc:creator: Eddie
item.description:
Nice blog! Thanks for sharing all this. Welcome to the Arab world. Remember, no matter how bad it might seem at times, you can always console yourself that at least it isn't "You-know-where!" :)
Keep us updated...there must be a way to link your blog to your FB account, I'd imagine.
item.content:encoded:
Nice blog! Thanks for sharing all this. Welcome to the Arab world. Remember, no matter how bad it might seem at times, you can always console yourself that at least it isn’t “You-know-where!” :)

Keep us updated…there must be a way to link your blog to your FB account, I’d imagine.
